lines.text: If your mother was alive... she would turn over in her grave!
What happened to the color TV?
Mama, I smoked the color TV!
[last lines]
Noooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!
You hate your own father!
I'd like to kill you, but I don't hate you.
I swear before God... and four more white people! This is the last time!
There's something you should know. I'm having an affair.
H-bomb! H-bomb!
It gets worse. She's white.
Nuclear holocaust!
Mine! Mine! Mine!
Ego! Ego! Ego!
He stole a radio out of my fucking car!
How do you know?
How do I know? He fucking tried to sell it back to me!

[Gator is roughly searching though his mother's apartment looking for money, tossing aside coupons]
I save a lot of money using them coupons!
Have you lost your natural mind, as well as your soul?

[kicking Flipper out after his infidelity]
There will be no penis between us!
Are you fucking my sister?
What kind of question is that?
It's a good question.
If you ever get her pregnant, Paulie...
Hey!
I don't know why I'm thinking this because I know it's not going to happen, but if you did, I would give *you* the abortion, Paulie.
[Charlie laughs]
Then you are going to marry her!
I was curious - so I jumped on it.
Literally.
Of course not. It is a myth. I think.

[Gator is dancing with his mother, trying to butter her up]
Hey pretty lady, you remember me?
Say what you have to say, and go, before your father comes back!
What's the matter? You don't like my dancing anymore? You usually offer to cook me something to eat.
I ain't playin' with you Gator! Say what you have to say and go. And if it's money then forget it!
[loosens herself from his grip]
The answer is no!
Momma, you gotta help me out. I'm sick. In order for me to get right, I need money!
You'd feel a whole lot better if you had a bath! Boy, the devil's got you!
Lord have mercy... on your twisted soul!
